00036 require_once('include.php');
00037 
00038 if ($_POST) {
00039     // User isset() here and allow posting empty strings to display error message
00040     if (isset($_POST['User'], $_POST['NewPassword'], $_POST['ReNewPassword'])) {
00041         if (in_array($_POST['User'], $ALL_USERS)) {
00042             if ($_POST['NewPassword'] === $_POST['ReNewPassword']) {
00043                 if (preg_match('/^\w{8,}$/', $_POST['NewPassword'])) {
00044                     if ($View->Controller($Output, 'SetPassword', $_POST['User'], sha1($_POST['NewPassword']))) {
00045                         cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'User password changed: '.$_POST['User']);
00046                         if ($_SESSION['USER'] == $_POST['User']) {
00047                             // Log user out if she changes her own password, currently only admin can do that
00048                             LogUserOut('User password changed');
00049                         }
00050                     }
00051                     else {
00052                         cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Password change failed: '.$_POST['User']);
00053                     }
00054                 }
00055                 else {
00056                     PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._NOTICE('Not a valid password'), 'auto', 'ERROR');
00057                     cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Password change failed: '.$_POST['User']);
00058                 }
00059             }
00060             else {
00061                 PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._NOTICE('Passwords do not match'), 'auto', 'ERROR');
00062                 cwwui_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Passwords do not match: '.$_POST['User']);
00063             }
00064         }
00065         else {
00066             PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._NOTICE('ComixWall currently supports only admin and user usernames'), 'auto', 'ERROR');
00067             cwwui_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Invalid user: '.$_POST['User']);
00068         }
00069     }
00070     else if ($_POST['LogLevel']) {
00071         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'SetLogLevel', $_POST['LogLevel'])) {
00072             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'LogLevel set: '.$_POST['LogLevel']);
00073             // Reset $LOG_LEVEL to its new value
00074             require($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php');
00075         }
00076     }
00077     else if ($_POST['DefaultLocale']) {
00078         $View->Controller($Output, 'SetLocale', $_POST['DefaultLocale']);
00079         // Reset $DefaultLocale to its new value
00080         require($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php');
00081     }
00082     else {
00083         if ($_POST['Disable']) {
00084             $View->Controller($Output, 'SetHelpBoxes', 'FALSE');
00085         }
00086         else if ($_POST['Enable']) {
00087             $View->Controller($Output, 'SetHelpBoxes', 'TRUE');
00088         }
00089         else if ($_POST['ReloadRate']) {
00090             $View->Controller($Output, 'SetReloadRate', $_POST['ReloadRate']);
00091         }
00092         else if ($_POST['SessionTimeout']) {
00093             $View->Controller($Output, 'SetSessionTimeout', $_POST['SessionTimeout']);
00094         }
00095         // Reset defaults to their new values
00096         require($VIEW_PATH.'/lib/setup.php');
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');

00166                 <select name="LogLevel">
00167                     <?php
00168                     foreach ($LOG_PRIOS as $Prio) {
00169                         $Selected= $Prio === $LOG_PRIOS[$LOG_LEVEL] ? 'selected' : '';
00170                         ?>
00171                         <option <?php echo $Selected ?> value="<?php echo $Prio ?>"><?php echo $Prio ?></option>
00172                         <?php
00173                     }
00174                     ?>
00175                 </select>
00176                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00177             </form>
00178         </td>
00179         <td class="none">
00180             <?php
00181             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('This is the log level for the ComixWall web interface. Logs at this level and up will be recorded in WUI and CWC log files. This setting does not effect other services.'));
00182             ?>
00183         </td>

00187             <?php echo _TITLE('Help boxes').':' ?>

00191                 <?php
00192                 $Button= $ShowHelpBox ? 'Disable' : 'Enable';
00193                 ?>
00194                 <input type="submit" name="<?php echo $Button ?>" value="<?php echo _($Button) ?>"/>
00195             </form>
00196         </td>
00197         <td class="none">
00198             <?php
00199             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('This setting enables or disables help boxes, such as this one and the help window at the bottom. Disabling help boxes does not disable error or warning help windows.'));
00200             ?>
00201         </td>
00202     </tr>
00203     <tr class="oddline">

00205             <?php echo _TITLE('Reload interval').':' ?>
00206         </td>
00207         <td>
00208             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00209                 <input type="text" name="ReloadRate" style="width: 50px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $DefaultReloadRate ?>" />
00210                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00211             </form>
00212         </td>
00213         <td class="none">
00214             <?php
00215             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('This is the default refresh value in seconds for pages which reload periodically, such as Live pages for logs and statistics. The new value takes effect only for newly created sessions. Note that logging out of the web user interface does not erase your session values.'));
00216             ?>
00217         </td>
00218     </tr>
00219     <tr class="evenline">
00220         <td class="title">
00221             <?php echo _TITLE('Session timeout').':' ?>
00222         </td>

00224             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00225                 <input type="text" name="SessionTimeout" style="width: 50px;" maxlength="4" value="<?php echo $SessionTimeout ?>" />
00226                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00227             </form>
00228         </td>
00229         <td class="none">
00230             <?php
00231             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('User sessions expire after an idle period defined by this value. The unit is in seconds. You cannot set a value less than 10 seconds.'));
00232             ?>
00233         </td>

00236 <?php
00237 PrintHelpWindow(_HELPWINDOW('These defaults are permanently stored in web user interface settings, i.e. they are <em>not</em> specific to your current session only.'));
